title: Modern Sofa Set
shortDescription: A stylish and comfortable modern sofa set.
fullDescription: This modern sofa set is perfect for any living room. Made with high-quality materials, it offers both comfort and durability. Available in various colors and sizes.

title: Luxury King Size Bed
shortDescription: Elegant king size bed for a luxurious sleep experience.
fullDescription: This luxury king size bed is designed to provide maximum comfort and style. It features a sturdy frame and a soft, supportive mattress. Perfect for any bedroom.

title: Vintage Wooden Dining Table
fullDescription: Add a touch of vintage charm to your dining room with this wooden dining table. Made from high-quality wood, it's both durable and stylish. Seats up to 6 people comfortably.

title: Ergonomic Office Chair
shortDescription: Comfortable ergonomic office chair for long hours of work.
fullDescription: This ergonomic office chair is designed to provide maximum comfort and support during long hours of work. It features adjustable height, lumbar support, and a breathable mesh back.

title: Stylish Floor Lamp
shortDescription: Modern stylish floor lamp for any room.
fullDescription: Illuminate your home with this modern floor lamp. It features a sleek design and provides ample lighting for any room. Easy to assemble and maintain.

title: Decorative Wall Art Set
shortDescription: Beautiful decorative wall art set to enhance your home decor.
fullDescription: This decorative wall art set includes three pieces of stunning artwork. Perfect for adding a touch of elegance to your living room, bedroom, or office. Easy to hang and maintain.

title: Stainless Steel Cookware Set
fullDescription: This 10-piece stainless steel cookware set includes all the essential pots and pans for your kitchen. Made from durable materials, it ensures even heat distribution and easy cleaning.

title: Luxury Bath Towels
shortDescription: Soft and absorbent luxury bath towels.
fullDescription: Wrap yourself in luxury with these soft and absorbent bath towels. Made from high-quality materials, they are perfect for daily use. Available in various colors.

title: Premium Cotton Bed Sheets
shortDescription: Comfortable and breathable premium cotton bed sheets.
fullDescription: Experience ultimate comfort with these premium cotton bed sheets. They are soft, breathable, and perfect for a good night's sleep. Available in various sizes and colors.

title: Smart LED TV
shortDescription: High-definition smart LED TV with multiple features.
fullDescription: Upgrade your entertainment system with this 55-inch smart LED TV. It features high-definition picture quality, smart connectivity, and multiple ports for your convenience.

title: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
shortDescription: Compact and portable Bluetooth speaker with excellent sound quality.
fullDescription: Enjoy your favorite music anywhere with this portable Bluetooth speaker. It offers excellent sound quality and long battery life. Perfect for both indoor and outdoor use.

title: Fitness Tracker Watch
shortDescription: Advanced fitness tracker watch with multiple features.
fullDescription: Track your fitness goals with this advanced fitness tracker watch. It monitors your heart rate, steps, sleep, and more. Water-resistant and compatible with most smartphones.
